data.name: Mandy's Room
data.detailed_description:
"Mandy's Dream" DLC!

The "Mandy's Dream" add-on is now included in Mandy's Room "Extra Features". In "Mandy's Dream", Mandy dreams that Mr. Jenkins transforms from a cute and fuzzy robot into a real man, and can finally give her what she has wanted from him all along! This add-on includes three new interactive scenes where the player gets to interact with Mandy in a new and exciting way!


About the Game



In Mandy’s Room, you have been invited into Mandy’s personal space, to be with her as she plays, dances and passes the time, and even when she is feeling naughty. You play the role of “Mr. Jenkins”, a cute robotic personal Diary device that can read Mandy’s mind and hear every cute and naughty thought she has.

Features:
  • A titillating story from start to finish, beginning with getting to know Mandy's secrets, and leading to sharing in her most intimate moments, and even participating and “calling the shots” when she wants you to.
  • Full English Voice content by a professional voice actress skilled in Adult voice-over.
  • A casual, linear, easy to follow experience meant to be enjoyed while relaxing hands-free in your favorite chair.
  • Interact with Mandy simply by Nodding and Shaking your head.
  • High-Resolution, High-Definition visuals and animations.
  • 'Intimate moments' filled with lip-biting, moans, shouts and squeals, with quite a few giggles mixed in.
  • "Mandy's Dream" allows the player to "interact" with Mandy in three unique "situations".

Though Mandy’s Room was built as a Virtual Reality experience for the Oculus Rift or HTC Vive, it can be just as fun on any PC or Mac without VR equipment. Mandy's Room is a casual experience, with no tricks or puzzles and no wrong answers. In Mandy's Room, everyone wins!

data.short_description: Mandy's Room is an Erotic Experience for PC, Mac, Oculus and Vive that takes you into Mandy's Personal space, where you observe and interact with her as she plays and dances, and even when she is feeling 'naughty'. Mandy is cute, sweet, funny and multi-orgasmic. Get to know her better now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 GPU w/ 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4500 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 GPU w/ 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11+
  • Processor: Core i5 4260+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 5000 +
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11+
  • Processor: Core i7 4260+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Iris 5100+
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Mandy's Room contains scenes of masturbation by the main character, who is somewhat obsessed with self-pleasure. The Extra Feature called "Mandy's Dream" features depictions of sexual intercourse. Sexual content is explicitly displayed in a number of scenes and is accompanied by a graphic/explicit voiceover.
